title: Execute Regression Test Suite
description: As a QA analyst, I want to run regression tests so that I can ensure new changes don't break existing functionality.
soThat: I can ensure new changes don't break existing functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Given regression test suite is prepared, when executed, then all critical user flows are validated
Given test results are generated, when reviewed, then any failures are clearly documented with steps to reproduce
Given tests complete successfully, when verified, then release readiness is confirmed
